scripts.clean: rm -rf generated && rm -rf generated-gc && rm -rf build && rm -rf build-gc
scripts.codegen: graph codegen && graph codegen -o generated-gc subgraph-gnosis-chain.yaml
scripts.doall: yarn clean && yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn build:gc
scripts.deploy:gc: graph deploy -o build-gc --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ jfschwarz/gno-voting-power-gc subgraph-gnosis-chain.yaml
